name: Amos Green's Final Repose
summary: Amos Green's Final Repose is the 17th adventure of Carol Reed by MDNA, a young woman from England living in Sweden. Carol is contacted by her best friend Stina, because her contact infos were found on a dead man, whose body was discovered in a newly reopened part of a natural reserve. She doesn't know him, so Carol is tasked to find the connection...
